name: A Very Short Space Trip
description:
MADE FOR MOONJAM

Developed by MaikzDev (Mouse Construction)
Song "Critical Error" by MokuseiNoMaguro (Pixabay.com)
Song "Third Space Speed" by ZakharValaha (Pixabay.com)

Probabily not a very short trip... anyways
FEATURES:
-Parallax 
-Low graphics

HOW TO PLAY:
The temporary box will teleport to any place on the screen, you have to click it to add 5 seconds to the chronometer at the top right, if that chronometer reaches 0, you lose.
